F.03 Battery.text:
WHAT: Figure F.03 Battery

CATEGORY: Core humanoid robot technology advancement

FEATURES: Pushes boundaries in energy density, safety, reliability, cost, and scale

CAPABILITIES: Dramatic increase in energy density by 94%, integrated battery system, improved safety and abuse tolerance

SPECS: Run Time: 2.3 kWh enables 5 hours of run time at peak performance

STAGE: Mass production components

LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/f-03-battery

NOTE: Custom battery packs for applications, first humanoid robot battery certified to UN38.3 and UL2271 standards, manufactured in-house at BotQ, transitioned from complex machining to high-volume manufacturing processes

company.text:
NAME: Figure

CONTACT: Not explicitly provided

LOCATION: Mountain View, California

POSITIONING: Leader in robot safety, differentiates product in market

COMPLIANCE: Worked with OSHA NRTL to develop UL standard for humanoid robot application

NOTE: Investing thousands of hours in battery system design to pass twenty-three primary tests
